name: Cafe No Date
description:
A dating simulation where the protagonist doesn't want to date !

Made for the GMTK jam with the theme :  "Genre without mecanics" . The game is finished but the writing was the not-definitive one (the last hours were difficult).

By : 

blaze : visual, character and background ( https://blazebytes.itch.io/ )
Horace RIBOUT : coding

The game was powered with Unity. Everything else have been create in 48h.

You can play a version of the game with music here : https://drive.google.com/open?id=1-HgzFp6ZSje-XldnG8OHFXqAC2C4cBTC . (Mac version : https://drive.google.com/open?id=19AqncPxCUY9mBjI0CbiPAie76D13aXn_  )

Music made within the 48h, by Theo Verpillat but integrated 2 hours late for the jam.
